Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by Texas in 1988...
Traded from Texas to New York (N) on 2/1/1989 (Going to NYM: LF E. Sprague Jr., P C. Nagy, P G. Hoffman. Going to TEX: P T. Boggs, 1B G. Biagini, DH A. Dawson, P G. Nelson)...
Injured on 5/6/1989 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/30/1989 with a Bruised Neck, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/28/1990, off John Burkett (PHI)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/28/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1990, hitting .524 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
